summary: This mod adds a \"Humanoid Troll\" Companion named Zentraal. The mesh comes from Vicn\'s Creature Resource Mod. YOU NEED DRAGONBORN DLC FOR THIS MOD TO WORK PROPERLY. You can find Zentaal in Ravenrock on the docks in Solstheim.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a \"Humanoid Troll\" Companion named Zentraal. The mesh comes from Vicn\'s Creature Resource Mod. *YOU NEED DRAGONBORN DLC FOR THIS MOD TO WORK PROPERLY*. You can find Zentaal in Ravenrock on the docks in Solstheim.

Check out my other mods: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4831711/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Mods[/url]

Thanks, enjoy the Nexus.
author: billmineface
